# Eng kamdan ko'p Prompting

Eng kamdan ko'p prompting (LtM)(@zhou2022leasttomost) CoT prompting usulini yanada rivojlantirib, muammoni avval kichik muammolarga ajratadi va keyin har birini yechadi. Bu usul bolalar uchun haqiqiy hayotdagi ta'lim strategiyalaridan ilhomlangan.

CoT promptingda bo'lgani kabi, yechilishi kerak bo'lgan muammo bir-biriga bog'liq kichik muammolarga ajratiladi. Ikkinchi bosqichda esa, bu kichik muammolar birma-bir yechiladi. Chain of thoughtdan farqli o'laroq, oldingi kichik muammolarning yechimi navbatdagi muammoni yechishga harakat qilinayotgan promptga kiritiladi.



## Misol: Mijoz so'roviga javob

Keling, biroz murakkabroq mijozlarga xizmat ko'rsatish savolini so'raylik:

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

<br />
Bu muvaffaqiyatsiz bo'ldi (biz qaytarish muddati ichidamiz), shuning uchun uni kichik muammolarga ajratib ko'ramiz:

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

<br />
Keling, birinchi kichik muammoni yechib ko'ramiz:

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

Faqat birinchi kichik muammoni yechish orqali butun muammoni hal qildik. Agar GPT-3 darhol javob bermaganida, keyingi kichik muammoni yechib, shu tarzda davom etishimiz mumkin edi. E'tibor bering, biz `Let's go step by step.` iborasidan foydalanamiz. Bu iborani qo'shish har doim ham shart emas, lekin bu misolda yordam beradi.

## Misol: harflarni birlashtirish

LtM dastlab muammoni bir necha bosqichga ajratish bo'yicha aniq ko'rsatma emas, balki few-shot prompting yordamida taqdim etilgan. Bundan tashqari, ba'zan uni zanjirli promptlar o'rniga bitta prompt bilan ham amalga oshirish mumkin. Keling, so'zlarning oxirgi harfini birlashtirish muammosini ko'rib chiqamiz (@wei2022chain) (masalan, `cake, etymology` so'zlari berilsa, natija `ey` bo'lishi kerak).

### Birinchi urinish: Standart

Few-shot misollar bilan standart prompt hatto text-davinci-003 kabi ilg'or modelda ham juda yomon natija beradi.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%3D"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

### Ikkinchi urinish: Chain of Thought

Chain of Thought standart promptingdan ancha yaxshi natija beradi. Chunki bu modelga har bir so'zning oxirgi harfini alohida ajratib olish imkonini beradi, natijada ilgari yig'ilgan harflarni guruhlash operatsiyasigacha murakkablikni kamaytiradi. Biroq, bu yondashuv so'zlar soni ko'payganda ishlamay qoladi.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

### Uchinchi urinish: Eng kamdan ko'p (bitta prompt)

Eng kamdan ko'p promptingda, Chain of Thought konsepsiyasini har bir bosqichda ilgari birlashtirilgan natijani qayta ifodalash orqali boyitamiz. Bu har bir bosqichni faqat bitta yangi harfni birlashtirishga soddalashtiradi. Bu esa 12 yoki undan ortiq so'zgacha yaxshi natija beradi.

Bu yondashuv Chain of Thoughtga juda o'xshab ko'rinishi mumkin, lekin mohiyatan juda farq qiladi. Bu yerda har bir bosqichda oldingi birlashtirish natijasini kiritamiz. Masalan, "think, machine, learning" holatida, harflarni alohida "k", "e", "g" tarzida birlashtirish o'rniga, avval "k" va "e" ni, so'ng "ke" va "g" ni birlashtiradi. Oldingi natijani qayta kiritish natijasida model natijani bosqichma-bosqich olib boradi va har bir bosqichda faqat ozgina ish bajarishi kerak bo'ladi, shuning uchun ancha uzun zanjirlarga umumlashtira oladi.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%3D"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

### Natijalar

12 ta so'zli oxirgi harfni birlashtirish muammosida Chain of Thought 34% aniqlikka ega bo'lsa, Eng kamdan ko'p prompting 74% aniqlikka ega (maqolada model sifatida text-davinci-002 ishlatilgan).

## Misol: kompozitsion umumlashtirish (SCAN)

SCAN benchmarki (@lake2018scan) modeldan tabiiy tilni harakatlar ketma-ketligiga aylantirishni talab qiladi. Masalan, "run left and walk twice" jumlasi "TURN_LEFT + RUN + WALK \* 2" ga tarjima qilinadi. Til modellari ayniqsa o'quv to'plamidagi ketma-ketliklardan uzunroq ketma-ketliklarga duch kelganda juda yomon natija ko'rsatadi.

### Birinchi urinish: Standart prompting

Oddiy standart promptlardan foydalangan holda, text-davinci-003 juda yaxshi natijaga erishadi, lekin baribir muvaffaqiyatsiz bo'ladi.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%3D"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

### Ikkinchi urinish: Eng kamdan ko'p, birinchi bosqich â€“ Soddalashtirish

Bu yerda biz 2 xil prompt bilan ishlaymiz. Birinchi prompt kiruvchi muammoni soddaroq bosqichlar ketma-ketligiga qisqartirish uchun ishlatiladi. Ikkinchi prompt esa ushbu soddalashtirilgan bosqichlar ketma-ketligini haqiqiy harakatlarga moslashtirish uchun ishlatiladi.

Ikkala prompt ham ancha uzun va tokenlarni tejash uchun harakatlar uchun qisqa python yozuvlaridan foydalanadi.

Birinchi bosqich tabiiy til tavsifini yanada aniq, lekin baribir inson tiliga yaqin shaklda ajratadi. Bu esa moslashtirish bosqichiga ketma-ketlikni aniqlashda yordam beradi.
Masalan, "jump around left twice" "jump left" -> `TURN_LEFT + JUMP` va "jump around left" -> `(TURN_LEFT + JUMP) * 4` ga qisqartiriladi. Xuddi shuningdek, soddalashtirish bosqichi takrorlash (twice, thrice va hokazo) tushunchasini tushuntirish uchun ishlatiladi.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%3D%3D"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

### Ikkinchi urinish: Eng kamdan ko'p, ikkinchi bosqich â€“ Moslashtirish

Ikkinchi bosqichda soddalashtirish natijasidan foydalanamiz va yana ancha uzun prompt (14 ta misol) yordamida soddalashtirilgan tabiiy til tavsifini harakatlar ketma-ketligiga tarjima qilamiz.

Bu yerda birinchi bosqich natijasini kiritamiz:

> "jump around left twice" quyidagilar yordamida yechiladi: "jump left", "jump around left", "jump around left twice". "walk opposite left thrice" quyidagilar yordamida yechiladi: "walk opposite left", "walk opposite left thrice". Demak, "jump around left twice after walk opposite left thrice" quyidagilar yordamida yechiladi: "jump left", "jump around left", "jump around left twice", "walk opposite left", "walk opposite left thrice".

LLMga kiritiladi.

<iframe
  src="https://embed.learnprompting.org/embed?%3D"
  style={{
    width: "100%",
    height: "500px",
    border: "0",
    borderRadius: "4px",
    overflow: "hidden",
  }}
  sandbox="allow-forms allow-modals allow-popups allow-presentation allow-same-origin allow-scripts"
></iframe>

### Natijalar

LtM bir nechta yaxshilanishlarga olib keladi:

- Chain of Thoughtga nisbatan aniqlik oshadi
- Promptdagidan murakkabroq muammolarda umumlashtirish qobiliyati oshadi
- Kompozitsion umumlashtirishda, ayniqsa SCAN benchmarkida (@lake2018scan) natijalar keskin yaxshilanadi

Maqolada ishlatilgan text-davinci-002 modeli bilan standart prompting SCAN muammolarining 6% ini yechishga olib keladi, Eng kamdan ko'p prompting esa hayratlanarli 76% muvaffaqiyat ko'rsatkichini beradi. code-davinci-002 bilan natijalar yanada yuqori bo'lib, Eng kamdan ko'p prompting 99.7% muvaffaqiyatga erishadi.
